SELECT c_gateway.id, c_gateway.gateway_code, c_gateway_attr1.`name`, c_gateway_attr1.location, c_gateway_attr1.`comment`, IFNULL(exist_client.client_num,0) client_num, c_gateway_upload_status.voltage, c_gateway_upload_status.status, b_status.`name` status_name, c_gateway_upload_status.interstatus, c_gateway_upload_status.tdate, timestampdiff(minute,c_gateway_upload_status.tdate,now()) AS gateway_rate, c_gateway_attr3.number, c_gateway_attr3.number2 FROM c_gateway LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr1 ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_attr1.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_attr3 ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_attr3.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN c_gateway_upload_status ON c_gateway.id = c_gateway_upload_status.c_gateway_id LEFT JOIN b_status ON b_status.b_status_main_id = '3' AND c_gateway_upload_status.status = b_status.value LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id,count(c_client_gateway.c_client_id) client_num FROM c_client_gateway INNER JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client_attr1.c_client_id = c_client_gateway.c_client_id WHERE c_client_attr1.staus = 1 AND c_client_attr1.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids} GROUP BY c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id
) exist_client ON exist_client.c_gateway_id = c_gateway.id WHERE 1=1 AND c_gateway_attr1.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids}
and ( c_gateway_attr1.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway.gateway_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.gateway_code}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway_attr1.location LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.location}),'%') )
and ( c_gateway_upload_status.status = #{pd.status} )
GROUP BY c_gateway.id

SELECT c_client_attr1.id, c_client_attr1.c_client_id,c_client.client_code, c_client_attr1.`name` cname, c_client_attr1.location, c_client_attr1.lamp_pole_num, c_client_upload_status.temperature, c_client_upload_status.voltage, c_client_upload_status.power_factor, b_status.name as `status_name`,c_client_upload_status.brightness, CASE WHEN c_client_attr1.node2 = '0' or c_client_attr1.node2 = '00' THEN c_client_attr1.node ELSE concat_ws('.',c_client_attr1.node,c_client_attr1.node2) END as node, c_client_upload_status.kwh, c_client_upload_status.status,
c_client_attr1.`comment`, c_client_upload_status.tdate, c_client_upload_status.current FROM c_client_gateway LEFT JOIN c_client ON c_client_gateway.c_client_id = c_client.id LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 ON c_client.id = c_client_attr1.c_client_id LEFT JOIN c_client_upload_status ON c_client_attr1.id = c_client_upload_status.c_client_id LEFT JOIN b_status ON b_status.value = c_client_upload_status.status and b_status.b_status_main_id='4' WHERE 1=1 AND c_client_gateway.type = '1' AND c_client_attr1.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} AND c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id = #{pd.id}
SELECT gateway_code FROM c_gateway where id = #{pd.id}
SELECT value, `name` FROM b_status where b_status_main_id = #{main_id}

SELECT c_sensor_attr1.id, c_sensor.sensor_code, c_sensor_attr1.`name` cname, c_sensor_attr1.location, c_sensor_attr1.lamp_pole_num, c_sensor_upload_status.temperature, c_sensor_upload_status.voltage, c_sensor_upload_status.power_factor, b_status.name as `status_name`, CASE WHEN c_sensor_attr1.node2 = '0' or c_sensor_attr1.node2 = '00' THEN c_sensor_attr1.node ELSE concat_ws('.',c_sensor_attr1.node,c_sensor_attr1.node2) END as node, c_sensor_upload_status.status, c_sensor_attr1.`comment`, c_sensor_upload_status.tdate FROM c_client_gateway LEFT JOIN c_sensor ON c_client_gateway.c_client_id = c_sensor.id LEFT JOIN c_sensor_attr1 ON c_sensor.id = c_sensor_attr1.c_sensor_id LEFT JOIN c_sensor_upload_status ON c_sensor_attr1.id = c_sensor_upload_status.c_sensor_id LEFT JOIN b_status ON b_status.value = c_sensor_upload_status.status and b_status.b_status_main_id='3' WHERE 1=1 AND c_client_gateway.type = '2' AND c_sensor_attr1.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids} AND c_client_gateway.c_gateway_id = #{pd.id}
